articles.title: Passenger vehicle sales set to cross 10 lakh mark in festive period this year - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The 68-day festive period this year falls between August 17 and November 14.
articles.content:
Domestic passenger vehicle sales are expected to cross 10 lakh mark in the festive period this year with demand remaining robust, especially for utility vehicles.

articles.title: Mcap of seven of top 10 firms falls by ₹74,603 cr; HDFC Bank biggest laggard - BusinessLine
articles.description: Last week, seven of the top 10 valued firms saw a combined market valuation drop of ₹74,603.06 crore, with HDFC Bank suffering the biggest loss. ICICI Bank, Hindustan Unilever, Infosys, ITC, Bajaj Finance all saw erosion in their mcap, while Reliance Industri…
articles.content:
The combined market valuation of seven of the top 10 valued firms declined by 74,603.06 crore last week, with HDFC Bank emerging as the biggest laggard.
